subject: Volunteers and Community Service
Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Aware of litigation against Major League Baseball, the N.F.L. this year hired some paid workers for positions normally filled by volunteers, making some wonder why it is not paying all of the workers.
snippet: Aware of litigation against Major League Baseball, the N.F.L. this year hired some paid workers for positions normally filled by volunteers, making some wonder why it is not paying all of the workers.
